attributes.action: Decriminalise cannabis use for medical purposes
attributes.additional_details: Cannabis has been known for many of things by mainstream stereotypes and misconceptions as a harmful drug that induces life-long deficiency’s. But putting it in comparison with overdoses and deaths linking from this particular drug, is most of all, very controversial. We demand a simple regulation that allows access for people suffering from most health conditions and diseases, to be given medicinal cannabis as a balm of some sort, to ensure their day-to-day life is more of ease.
attributes.background: For years now people have suffered from strict regulations for a drug that’d appear to most as a plant. The government have failed the people not only on the war on drugs, but their failure to ensure an easy -  efficient regulation that works for the law, the system and the people.
